column5: Some very nice words there.  Sorry for your loss.

A tragic loss to all who knew her. I am glad to see you still hold her memories and the gift she gave to you and your mother and the ones who are still around her.As the body leaves it leaves 2 important things the memories and the spirit both will live on in the lucky ones hearts who knew her.  Art
Sorry to hear about your losses. May God have mercy
Sorry to hear of your loss, she truly was an angel always looking out for the ones she loved, and your posting shows she was truly loved as well God Bless you all John Peg and CB
Thanks also to you Aplumma and to you also liverelease. Your thoughts and kind words are truly appreciated.
